text.value:
@{concat('UPDATE ', variables('METADATA_SCHEMA'), '.', variables('METADATA_RULESET_TABLE'), 
' SET source_metadata = JSON_MODIFY(
        source_metadata, 
        ''$.partition_values'', 
        JSON_QUERY(', if(empty(pipeline().parameters.P_LOGICAL_PARTITION_ID), 'null', concat('''', string(pipeline().parameters.P_LOGICAL_PARTITION_ID), '''')), ')
) 
WHERE dataset = ''', variables('DATASET'), ''' 
AND specified_database = ''', pipeline().parameters.P_ADLS_CONTAINER_NAME, ''' 
AND CONCAT(specified_schema, identified_column) = CONCAT(''', pipeline().parameters.P_COSMOS_SOURCE_DATABASE, ''', ''/'', ''', pipeline().parameters.P_COSMOS_SOURCE_CONTAINER, ''', ''', if(empty(pipeline().parameters.P_LOGICAL_PARTITION_KEY), '', pipeline().parameters.P_LOGICAL_PARTITION_KEY), ''')')}

dependsOn.activity: Until Cosmos To ADLS Durable Function Is Success
Update Copy Cosmos Data To ADLS State Failed

ifFalseActivities.name: Update Copy Cosmos Data To ADLS State Failed

value.value: @activity('Until Cosmos To ADLS Durable Function Is Success').ExecutionEndTime

activities.name: Until Cosmos To ADLS Durable Function Is Success
activities.description: Polls for completion of the Cosmos To ADLS export. Retries until success or timeout.

dependsOn.activity: Check If We Should Copy Data To ADLS

activities.name: Poll Only If Copy Data To ADLS Is True
Check If We Should Copy Data To ADLS

ifTrueActivities.name: Copy Cosmos Data To ADLS
ifTrueActivities.description: Copy Data from Cosmos DB to ADLS source as '|' separated csv files

activities.name: Check If We Should Update Copy State

ifTrueActivities.name: Update Copy Cosmos Data To ADLS State
Discover Structure For CSV
ifTrueActivities.description: This will get the schema of the first csv file in the file list

dependsOn.activity: Check If We Should Rediscover Data

sqlReaderQuery.value:
SELECT DISTINCT
    specified_database,
    specified_schema,
    identified_table
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_SCHEMA}.@{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE}
WHERE
LOWER(dataset) = LOWER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_DATASET}')
AND LOWER(specified_database) = LOWER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_STORAGE_CONTAINER_TO_SCAN}')
AND LOWER(specified_schema) LIKE '@{pipeline().parameters.P_DIRECTORY}%'
AND (discovery_complete IS NULL OR discovery_complete = 0)
ORDER BY identified_table

SELECT TOP 1 source_metadata
FROM @{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_SCHEMA}.@{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE}
WHERE dataset = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_DATASET}'
    AND specified_database = '@{item().specified_database}'
    AND specified_schema = '@{item().specified_schema}'
    AND identified_table = '@{item().identified_table}'

activities.name: Check If We Should Rediscover Data

ifTrueActivities.name: Mark Tables Undiscovered
ifTrueActivities.description: Mark all tables in this database and schema as undiscovered so that we can re-discover sensitive data in them

text.value:
UPDATE @{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_SCHEMA}.@{pipeline().parameters.P_METADATA_RULESET_TABLE}
SET discovery_complete = CAST(0 AS BIT)
WHERE
    dataset = '@{pipeline().parameters.P_DATASET}'
    AND UPPER(specified_database) = UPPER('@{pipeline().parameters.P_STORAGE_CONTAINER_TO_SCAN}')
    AND specified_schema LIKE '@{pipeline().parameters.P_DIRECTORY}%'

activities.name: If Has More Items In Current Directory

ifFalseActivities.name: False - Pop Current Directory And Push New Directories

dependsOn.activity: False - Pop Current Directory And Push New Directories

ifTrueActivities.name: True - Push New Directories To Queue

dependsOn.activity: Validate And Set Max Levels To Recurse

activities.name: Check If Specified Directory Is Valid
Fail If Directory Does Not Exists

dependsOn.activity: Check If Specified Directory Is Valid

expression.value: @equals(activity('Check if specified directory is valid').output.exists, false)

message.value: The directory @{pipeline().parameters.P_DIRECTORY} is an invalid blob

activities.name: Validate And Set Max Levels To Recurse
activities.description: Validate that the specified level is greater than 0 and correctly set the level relative to the root level

dependsOn.activity: Fail If Directory Does Not Exists

ifFalseActivities.name: Set Max Levels To Recurse
ifFalseActivities.description: Set the correct max levels to recursed starting at the specified directory

ifTrueActivities.name: Invalid Recursion Level
ifTrueActivities.description: Fail if levels to recurse is less than 0

message.value: The specified value of pipeline parameter P_MAX_LEVELS_TO_RECURSE=@{pipeline().parameters.P_MAX_LEVELS_TO_RECURSE} should be greater than or equal to 0

activities.name: Parse Response And Set Blob List

dependsOn.activity: Parse Response And Set Blob List

sources.name: SourceData1MillRowDataSampling
sources.description: Import the first million rows of unmasked data from the desired source dataset

sources.name: MetadataStoreRead
sources.description: Import data from Metadata Datastore, querying the ruleset table

sinks.name: WriteToMetadataStore
sinks.description: Sink results of profiling to metadata data store by sinking the unrolled results of the profiling call to the appropriate columns in the metadata store

transformations.name: CreateRandomIdColumn
transformations.description: Add a DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_RANDOM_ID column, which is generated via the random expression. The current timestamp in milliseconds is used as the seed for the number generation

transformations.name: SortByRandomId
transformations.description: Sort the sample rows based on the randomly generated IDs

transformations.name: CreateFinalSelectionId
transformations.description: Add a DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_FINAL_SELECTION_ID column that increments by 1 and starts at 1. It is incremented in order of the DELPHIX_COMPLIANCE_SERVICE_RANDOM_ID added previously, making it so that the surrogate key is in order of the randomly assigned value, creating a shuffled set of rows

transformations.name: GetRandomRows
transformations.description: Take the first DF_NUM_ROWS_TO_PROFILE from the shuffled row set

transformations.name: CreateItemsList
transformations.description: For every column that we didn't add collect it to produce a list of values, and encode the column name to avoid reserved characters

transformations.name: ParseAPIResponse
transformations.description: Parse the API response from profiling call

transformations.name: AssertNoFailures
transformations.description: Confirm that we received a 200 response status from the API request

transformations.name: FlattenDetails
transformations.description: Unroll the API response body into columnName, domain, algorithm, confidence, and rowsConsidered

transformations.name: FilterRowsToUpdate
transformations.description: Filter ruleset table down to the table in question by specifying dataset, specified_database, specified_schema, and identified_table - making sure they match the dataset associated with each version of the dataflow, DF_SOURCE_DATABASE, DF_SOURCE_SCHEMA, and DF_SOURCE_TABLE (respectively). This filters the ruleset down to only the columns that need to be profiled for this particular table

transformations.name: JoinDetailsAndMetadata
transformations.description: Inner join on FlattenDetails and FilterRowsToUpdate based on matching column names

transformations.name: ChecksBeforeSave
transformations.description: Alter rows using Update if (only update rows that need updating)

transformations.name: FilterOnlyNewlyProfiledRows
transformations.description: Filter rows where the profiling results are different from previous dataflow executions (i.e. the profiled_domain, profiled_algorithm, rows_profiled, confidence_score or row_count have changed)

transformations.name: ItemsListWithRenamedColumns
transformations.description: Decode the encoded column name to restore it to the source column name

scriptLines: items as (details as (columnName as string, domain as string, algorithm as string, confidence as float, rowsConsidered as integer)[])),

ParseAPIResponse assert(expectTrue(toInteger(regexExtract(status, '(\\d+)', 1)) == 200, false, 'Failed_request', null, iif(isNull(body.message), status, concatWS(', ', 'timestamp: ' + toString(body.timestamp), 'status: ' + body.status, 'message: ' + body.message, 'trace_id: ' + body.trace_id))),
